item.title: Let's Kill This MacBook! - How to Mine Monero on a Mac
item.description: MacBook Pro 13 without TouchBar My good friend wants to kill his MacBook He’s already had it, the one in the picture above, for a couple of years, and the battery is starting to degrade. He has a decent budget for a new computer, but doesn’t want to buy a new laptop until this one stops functioning. We are going to destroy the MacBook by heat over the next few weeks.
